flawed_nl_solution:
Calculating the difference between the can lids Aaron has now and the amount that he had initially shows there were 53 - 14 = <<53-14=39>>39 can lids in the boxes of canned tomatoes.
As the boxes are the same size, splitting these can lids equally shows that there were 39 / 3 = <<39/3=31>>31 can lids in each box.
#### 31

error_details.explanation: The result of this computation should be 13, not 31. It appears two adjacent digits were swapped.
